title: Smolder
description: The Firebrand Whelp breathes fire and scales into late game dominance.

title: Mel
description: The Noxian councilor wields magic and political power in equal measure.

title: Briar
description: The Restrained Hunger tears through the jungle with brutal efficiency.

title: Jhin
description: The Virtuoso creates deadly art with every precisely placed shot.

title: Akshan
description: The Rogue Sentinel swings into battle seeking justice and redemption.

title: Thresh
description: The Chain Warden hooks enemies and drags them to their doom.

title: Garen
description: The Might of Demacia spins his way to victory in the top lane.

title: Yasuo
description: The Unforgiven dances through enemies with wind and steel.

title: Leona
description: The Radiant Dawn protects her allies with solar-powered shields.

title: Graves
description: The Outlaw blasts his way through the jungle with explosive shells.

title: Darius
description: The Hand of Noxus dominates the top lane with brutal executions.

title: Jinx
description: The Loose Cannon brings explosive chaos to every team fight.

title: Azir
description: The Emperor of the Sands commands his army from the mid lane.

title: Nautilus
description: The Titan of the Depths anchors the bot lane with crowd control.

title: Elise
description: The Spider Queen weaves her web of death through the jungle.

title: Fiora
description: The Grand Duelist parries her way to victory in top lane duels.

title: Kai'Sa
description: Daughter of the Void evolves and adapts to every threat.

title: Orianna
description: The Lady of Clockwork commands her ball with mechanical precision.

title: Braum
description: The Heart of the Freljord shields his allies from all harm.

title: Lee Sin
description: The Blind Monk kicks his enemies across the jungle battlefield.

title: Camille
description: The Steel Shadow slices through top lane opposition with precision.

title: Ezreal
description: The Prodigal Explorer maps his enemies' destruction from range.

title: Zed
description: The Master of Shadows eliminates targets from the mid lane.
